20101220013616.000|20101220013617.250|CCO|THE MIND OF THE MAJORITY THAN 
20101220013617.250|20101220013618.500|CCO|KNOWING YOU'RE ABOUT TO BE IN

20101220013619.750|20101220013621.000|CCO|ALL THE LONG DEFERRED PIECES OF 
20101220013621.000|20101220013622.429|CCO|SLEDGE SLAGS, DEMOCRATS REALIZE 
20101220013622.429|20101220013623.857|CCO|IT'S NOW OR NEVER, SO THINGS ARE
20101220013623.857|20101220013625.286|CCO|MOVING FAST.
20101220013625.286|20101220013626.714|CCO|>> ABOUT A MONTH AND A HALF AGO,

20101220015046.000|20101220015047.000|CCO|NEARLY 2 MILLION PEOPLE A YEAR

20101220015114.333|20101220015117.667|CCO|THROES OF A GENUINE EMERGENCY.
20101220015117.667|20101220015121.000|CCO|>> YOU CAN FEEL IT.
20101220015121.000|20101220015123.500|CCO|>> Reporter: DR. ANN GOLDFELD, A
20101220015123.500|20101220015126.000|CCO|HARVARD SCIENTIST WHO IS ONE OF
20101220015126.000|20101220015128.500|CCO|THE WORLD'S LEADING EXPERTS OF

20101220015133.222|20101220015134.333|CCO|UNTREATED, HOW SICK COULD SHE 
20101220015134.333|20101220015135.444|CCO|GET?

20101220015136.556|20101220015137.667|CCO|>> Reporter: HOW SOON?

20101220015138.778|20101220015139.889|CCO|WITHIN WEEKS.
20101220015139.889|20101220015141.000|CCO|>> Reporter: SO, SHE NEEDS BE 
20101220015141.000|20101220015142.667|CCO|DIAGNOSED RIGHT AWAY, BECAUSE 
20101220015142.667|20101220015144.333|CCO|ONCE TB TAKES HOLD, IT ATTACKS 
20101220015144.333|20101220015146.000|CCO|THE LUNGS AND THEN SPREADS, 
20101220015146.000|20101220015147.667|CCO|LEAVING PATIENTS WITHERED AND 
20101220015147.667|20101220015149.333|CCO|WASTED.
20101220015149.333|20101220015151.000|CCO|BUT HERE'S THE PROBLEM.
20101220015151.000|20101220015152.667|CCO|EVEN THOUGH TB NOW KILLS NEARLY 
20101220015152.667|20101220015154.333|CCO|2 MILLION PEOPLE A YEAR, THE 
20101220015154.333|20101220015156.000|CCO|TOOLS WE HAVE TO DIAGNOSE THE 
20101220015156.000|20101220015157.667|CCO|DISEASE ARE DECADES OLD.

20101220015159.333|20101220015201.000|CCO|FIND OUT WHAT KIND OF TB 
20101220015201.000|20101220015203.000|CCO|SOMEBODY HAS.

20101220015205.000|20101220015207.000|CCO|THE EPIDEMIC OF TB, WHICH CAN BE

20101220015209.000|20101220015211.000|CCO|MUCH WORSE.
